perturbation.original_text:
5.7 Payment for Products. Todos shall invoice the Reseller for all sums due for Products ordered upon shipment of the ordered Products to
the Reseller, and the Reseller shall pay such sums by no later than thirty (30) days from the date of shipment. All payments made to Todos shall be
in New Israeli Shekels.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.7 Payment for Products. Todos shall invoice the Reseller for all sums due for Products ordered upon shipment of the ordered Products to
the Reseller, and the Reseller shall pay such sums by no later than sixty (60) days from the date of shipment. All payments made to Todos shall be
in New Israeli Shekels.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states payment is due within 30 days. Later, another clause will contradict this, creating uncertainty about the payment deadline.

perturbation.original_text: 5.8 Taxes. Reseller shall be responsible for paying all sales, use, excise, and value-added taxes imposed on the sale or use of the Products.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.8 Taxes. Reseller shall be responsible for paying all sales, use, excise, and value-added taxes imposed on the sale or use of the Products. However, Todos will reimburse Reseller for 50% of all sales taxes upon presentation of valid receipts.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states Reseller is fully responsible for all taxes, however, it is now contradicted by a subsequent clause where Todos reimburses 50% of sales taxes. This creates ambiguity regarding who ultimately bears the tax burden and to what extent.

perturbation.original_text:
6.  Reporting and Audit Rights
6.1 Books and Records. During the term and for a period of three (3) years following the termination or expiration of this Agreement, the
Reseller shall maintain complete books of accounts and records consistent with sound business and accounting principles and practices
consistently applied.
perturbation.changed_text:
6.  Reporting and Audit Rights
6.1 Books and Records. During the term and for a period of one (1) year following the termination or expiration of this Agreement, the
Reseller shall maintain complete books of accounts and records consistent with sound business and accounting principles and practices
consistently applied.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause requires the Reseller to maintain records for three years after termination. Now the records retention timeframe is reduced to 1 year, creating a contradiction with the 3 year requirement.
